SEARCH
Package io.papermc.paper.datacomponent.item

Interface Equippable

All Superinterfaces:
BuildableDataComponent<Equippable,Equippable.Builder>
@NullMarked @Experimental @NonExtendable public interface Equippable extends BuildableDataComponent<Equippable,Equippable.Builder>
Holds the equippable properties of an item.
See Also:
  • DataComponentTypes.EQUIPPABLE
